content:
Hi all,

Would there be any interest of a port of HAPI for PHP, based on Laravel? I've toyed with setting this up in the past but wanted to gauge the community interest in such an effort.
I might recommend also asking this in #implementers - HAPI being a Java library, PHP developers are presumably less likely to be watching this stream.

Neat idea though- I'm not a PHP/Laravel developer myself so I have no idea what it would look like, but I do know that the HAPI.net (hl7v2 in C#) library started its long and successful life as a port of HAPI.
Great, I can cross post there. Out of curiosity what happened to HAPI.NET? I cannot find it from a quick Google search...
Sorry- Was remembering the name wrong. It's called NHapi: http://nhapi.sourceforge.net/home.php
Great, I just found the link on GitHub too. https://github.com/duaneedwards/nHapi/ - last updates were years ago but this is a nice reference. Thank you.
